DOC.criteria: Chest pain either ST segment elevation depression > 0.1 mV least 2 contiguous electrocardiographic lead well elevation troponin level . History medical condition know alter neopterin concentration blood . The exclusion criterion include : renal failure , history HIV , transplant patient , active infection , history autoimmune disease , malignancy , phenylketonuria , immune mediate liver disease , patient take immunomodulating therapy .
